div.ab: zōt: Anklesaria, Kotwal and Boyd, Geldner.

ab.ab: āϑraēca ahurahe mazdā̊ raϑβaēca bərəzaite ~ Y22.5, VrS78.14, VrS82.2, VrS90.2 āϑrō ahurahe mazdā̊ raϑβō bərəzatō yō aṣ̌ahe.

Parallels.ab: vīspaiiā̊ sącat̰ca aṣ̌aōnō stōiš yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōϑrāica frasastaiiaēca = VrS11.35, VrS24.10, VrS24.12, VrS27.6, VrS27.16, VrS42.8, VrS42.10, VrS65.8, VrS65.10, VrS75.8, VrS75.10, VrS89.19, VrS89.21.
vīspaiiā̊ sącat̰ca aṣ̌aōnō stōiš ~ Y8.11, Y11.17, Y52.2, Y52.5, Y52.9, Y68.20, Y68.29, Y70.6, VrS27.1 vīspaiiā̊ aṣ̌aōnō stōiš; ~ Y55.3 vīspaiiā̊sca aṣ̌aōnō stōiš; ~ Y19.9 vīspąm aṣ̌aōnō stīm.
